thread.section_title: www.connections.be Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van www.connections.be | connections.be
thread.title: Victoria Sheehy

author: Victoria Sheehy
title: Victoria Sheehy
text: Before using this service I was unaware that Connections had their own small team of travel agents who work with you on an individual basis to create the holiday that you are looking for. I found Philippe Smolders to be incredibly efficient, extraordinarily hard-working and 100% responsive to all of my questions. It was a totally different experience to that which you get when you going to Connections travel store.
